about_the_game:
Game Introduction:

Welcome to "Chaos Haven", a paradise that combines adventure, cultivation, exploration, and idyllic country life. In this post-apocalyptic world overrun by demons, you will play as a refugee who accidentally discovers a mysterious village protected by cultivators - Taoyuan Village.

Core Gameplay:

  • Tasks and Challenges: In Taoyuan Village, you need to complete various tasks issued by the villagers. These tasks are not only crucial for your survival, but also a bridge for you to integrate into the village. Additionally, your actions will affect the female characters' favorability towards you, and an increase in favorability will bring you generous rewards and deeper interactions.
  • Farming and Planting: In Taoyuan Village, you will experience the joy of planting. Watering the crop every day and watching them grow vigorously will make you forget the distractions of the outside world.
  • Fishing and Exploration: Explore every water area on the map and enjoy the tranquility and fun of fishing. The waters hide a wealth of fish and treasures, and every fishing trip is a new adventure.
  • Multiple Ending Scenarios: The game's storyline is rich and diverse, and every decision made by the player may change the direction of the plot. Your choices will determine your fate and also affect the future of Taoyuan Village.

Unique Features:

  • Cultivator Protection: Taoyuan Village is protected by cultivators, filled with mystery and ancient traditions. Here, you will learn various cultivation knowledge and enhance your abilities.
  • Female Character Interaction: Each female character has a unique personality and background story. Interacting with them will bring you rich emotional experiences. Increasing favorability not only grants rewards but also unlocks more storylines.
  • Authentic Farming Experience: The farming system in the game realistically simulates the processes of planting, watering, and harvesting, allowing you to truly feel the joy and sense of achievement of farming.
  • Pleasure of Water Area Exploration: The vast and mysterious water areas on the map hide new fish and treasures with every exploration. Fishing is not only a leisurely activity but also a challenge and adventure.
